name: Off-Road Big Rig Truck Simulator 3D Driving School
name_original: Off-Road Big Rig Truck Simulator 3D Driving School
description:
Drive monster heavy trucks to test offroad driving skills in latest truck driver simulator game. Explore the ultimate off-road truck driver within yourself on steep, curvy and dangerous roads. Drive for unlimited hours as a real trucker and explore the big 3D open world in Offroad Big Rig Truck Driver game.

Are you ready for realistic and exciting driving experience to become the best truck driver here? Then offroad trucker game is waiting for you. Train your offroad driving ability and enjoy amazing features euro trucks provide. Deliver luggage in heavy cargo trucks from one place to another and start adventure on steep and curvy roads. Drive multiple vehicles in realistic environment and be an off road driver.
Test your reckless driving skills in a big open world, full of different locations on treacherous and curvy roads. In this game, driving off road is even more dangerous than hill climbing so you have to do it very attentively. Drive big rig truck carefully on steep and curvy roads. Try not to damage cargo you transport and become a big truck transporter.

Game features:
Multiple challenging trucker missions for heavy transportation
Ultimate haul truck driving simulation
Following vehicles in off-terrain truck driving:
Animal transporter truck
Extreme dump hauler
Cargo delivery vehicle
Off road army jeep
Logging Truck
Hinged Trailer
Advanced physics engine designed for big trucks
Realistic 3D graphics in countryside surroundings
Countryside rugged terrain and treacherous roads along steep hills


Give us your feedback in the reviews section and help us improve our games in future releases.
